messages.subject: The SOS Conference in October
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, Folks! I just found out about the SOS conference in Columbia, S.C. in a few weeks (October 11-13), and I m really excited about going!!!  My husband s not
messages.messageBody:
Hi, Folks!

I just found out about the SOS conference in Columbia, S.C. in a few weeks
(October 11-13), and I'm really excited about going!!! My husband's not
going to be able to go, but Liam (7) and I raring to anyway.

Although the price of the conference itself is extremely reasonable, the
room rates are a wee bit steep for us. We are considering camping (which
would be a lot of fun, too), but it seems like there's going to be a lot of
fun stuff going on into the night at the conference that we would like not
to miss if we can.

With that in mind, we are wondering if anyone might be interested in
sharing a room with us. That would make this whole thing a lot more doable
for us.

By the way, although we drive an '92 Toyota Corolla (it's a great,
comfortable car, though), we would be delighted to offer a ride to someone
would like to go and needs a ride!


Take care,

Marji

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
